TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the families of drugs called antitumor antibiotics and topoisomerase inhibitors. Also called NSC 655649.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "análogo de la rebecamicina"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer. Es un tipo de antibiótico antitumoral y de inhibidor de la topoisomerasa. También se llama NSC 655649.
